author: Simon Difford
description: Sour grapefruit and sweet bergamot balance each other in this refreshingly light aperitivo.
name: ItaliCup
recipeIngredient: 45 ml Italicus or other Rosolio di Bergamotto / bergamot liqueur
2 Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR first 3 ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass whilst also pouring soda
